Description:
Technical Development Solutions Co.(TDS) is looking for a strong full stack developer, with high levels of expertise in SQL and .NET services (REST) and .NET core. Our team supports the business with many service-based applications/processes. The candidate will need to additionally work on some front-end applications using React and React native. Some level of knowledge in areas of either UI/UX and web design is helpful. You will be able to work both independently and as part of a small team (with support from BA/QA).The main responsibilities and duties:Write clean and organized code.
Build new solutions from scratch.
Modify and enhance current applications.
Write code documentation according to company standards.
Conduct performance testing and consistency checks.Skills
Skills:
Experience in software development 5 to 10 years.
Experience in relational database (T-SQL and PLSQL).
Experience in ASP.NET and .NET Core.
Experience in JavaScript and jQuery.
Experience in REST API (development, testing and deployment).
Knowledge of SOAP.
Experience in windows services development, debugging and installation.
Experience in React and React native.
Experience in testing code using unit tests.
Experience in Power BI dashboard is a plus.
Nice to have TFS/Azure DevOps.
Knowledge of building logical models and analysis approaches.
Ability to speak & communicate in English.
Work independently or within a team.
